title: SKPaint.IsVerticalText is not work on UWP
body:
Hi. I tested SkiaSharp with latest Xamarin framework, to build Android and UWP app.

But I found that SKPaint.IsVerticalText = true is not work correctly on UWP platform. 

When I set SKPaint.IsVerticalText = true, SKPaint.MeasureText() return 0 (also return NaN as bounds). Also text is rendered horizontally.

On Android, text is correctly rendered vertically.

This is my test environment:
SkiaSharp v1.59.3
Xamarin.Forms v2.5.0.122203

Android App targeting : Android 8.0 (Oreo)
UWP App targeting : Windows 10 Fall Creators Update (10.0; Build 16299)
